memberdef.name: GXV_LIMIT_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ if ( p + _count > ( limit? limit : gxvalid->root->limit ) ) \ FT_INVALID_TOO_SHORT; \ FT_END_STMNT

memberdef.name: GXV_TRACE_HEXDUMP
memberdef.initializer: FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ { \ FT_Bytes b; \ \ \ for ( b = p; b < (FT_Bytes)p + len; b++ ) \ FT_TRACE1(("\\x%02x", *b)) ; \ } \ FT_END_STMNT

memberdef.name: GXV_TRACE_HEXDUMP_C
memberdef.initializer: FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ { \ FT_Bytes b; \ \ \ for ( b = p; b < (FT_Bytes)p + len; b++ ) \ if ( 0x40 < *b && *b < 0x7E ) \ FT_TRACE1(("%c", *b)) ; \ else \ FT_TRACE1(("\\x%02x", *b)) ; \ } \ FT_END_STMNT

memberdef.name: GXV_SUBTABLE_LIMIT_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ if ( ( p + (_count) - gxvalid->subtable_start ) > \ gxvalid->subtable_length ) \ FT_INVALID_TOO_SHORT; \ FT_END_STMNT

memberdef.name: GXV_ODTECT
memberdef.initializer: GXV_odtect_DataRec odtect ## _range[n]; \ GXV_odtect_RangeRec odtect ## _rec = { 0, NULL }; \ GXV_odtect_Range odtect = NULL

memberdef.name: GXV_ODTECT_INIT
memberdef.initializer: FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ odtect ## _rec.nRanges = 0; \ odtect ## _rec.range = odtect ## _range; \ odtect = & odtect ## _rec; \ FT_END_STMNT
